.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .searchbox .btnStrong {  left: 0; top: 0; width: 34px; height: 34px; overflow: hidden; position: absolute; font-size: 1px; line-height: 0; color: transparent; padding: 0; margin: 0; border: 0; outline: 0; cursor: pointer; background: transparent;}
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a #shopQ .typePopup .searchForm .search { margin: 0; border-bottom: 0; }
/* 연관검색어 */
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a #shopQ .keywordArea { padding-bottom:10px; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a #shopQ .keywordArea .inner { padding:0 16px 16px; }

.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a #shopQ .keywordArea .list > a:hover { text-decoration:none; }
/* prd */
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productPackage { background:#fff; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList { position:relative; width:100%; padding:20px 16px 0; box-sizing:border-box; background-color:#fff; border-top: 1px solid #e5e9f2;}
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .xans-product-searchdata { padding: 0 62px 20px 0; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList img { max-width:100%; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList li { vertical-align:top; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .prdList:after { content:''; display:block; clear:both; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .thumbnail { position:relative; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .thumbnail a { display:block; position:relative; font-size:0; background:#f6f6f8; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .thumbnail a img { max-width:100%; max-height:100%; width:100%; height:auto; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .thumbnail .prdIcon { position:absolute; top:0; left:0; width:100%; height:100%; background-repeat:no-repeat; background-size:30% auto; } /* ??????????????? */
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .thumbnail .icon { position:absolute; bottom:0; left:0; font-size:0; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .thumbnail .icon img { margin:0 4px 0 0; vertical-align:bottom; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description { min-height:102px; padding:7px 0 20px; text-align:left; box-sizing:border-box; word-break:break-all; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .name { display:block; display:-webkit-box; overflow:hidden; word-wrap:break-word; max-height:36px; font-weight:normal; line-height:18px; text-overflow:ellipsis; -webkit-line-clamp:2; -webkit-box-orient:vertical; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .name a { display:block; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .name a:hover { text-decoration:none; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .name a,
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .name a > span { font-size:12px; line-height:18px; color:#000; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .price { font-size:12px; color:#000; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .strike,
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .mPriceStrike { color:#999; } /* 할인 전 가격 */
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .spec .mileage { display:inline-block; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .color { overflow:hidden; margin:0; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .color .chips { float:left; width:12px; height:10px; margin:0 2px 2px 0; font-size:0; line-height:0; border:1px solid #e3e3e3; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .likeButton button { border:0; background:none; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .likeButton button strong { margin:0 0 0 3px; font-size:11px; line-height:20px; color:#757575; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .likeButton.selected button strong { line-height:20px; color:#2e2e2e; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .icon { display:block; margin:17px 0 0 0; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .description .icon img { margin:2px 2px 0 0; vertical-align:middle; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList.typeThumb .prdList { display:-webkit-flex; display:-ms-flex; display:flex; -ms-flex-wrap:wrap; -webkit-flex-wrap:wrap; flex-wrap:wrap; margin:0 0 0 -10px; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList.typeThumb .prdList > li { float:left; width:50%; -webkit-flex-basis:50%; -ms-flex-basis:50%; flex-basis:50%; box-sizing:border-box; padding: 0 0 20px 0; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList.typeThumb .prdList > li > .inner { padding-left:10px; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList.typeThumb .prdList.small > li { width:33.3%; -webkit-flex-basis:33.3%; -ms-flex-basis:33.3%; flex-basis:33.3%; }
/* 정렬 버튼 */
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .btnSorting { position:absolute; right:16px; top:20px; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .btnSorting button { overflow:hidden; position:relative; float:left; width:31px; height:28px; box-sizing:border-box; font-size:1px; line-height:0; color:transparent; background:#ededed; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .btnSorting button.selected { border:1px solid #000; background:#fff; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .btnSorting button:before { content:''; position:absolute; left:50%; top:50%; width:12px; height:12px; margin:-6px 0 0 -6px; background:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/sfix_btn_sorting.png') no-repeat 0 0; background-size:100px auto; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .btnSorting button.bigView:before { background-position:0 0; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .btnSorting button.bigView.selected:before { background-position:0 -50px; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .btnSorting button.smallView:before { background-position:-50px 0; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productList .btnSorting button.smallView.selected:before { background-position:-50px -50px; }
/* paginate */
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productPaginate.typeList { display: block; margin:20px auto 0; padding:0 0 48px; text-align:center; background:#fff; white-space: nowrap; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productPaginate.typeList [class*='btn'] { display:inline-block; position:relative; width:30px; height:30px; font-size:1px; line-height:0; color:transparent; border:1px solid #dedfe2; vertical-align:top; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productPaginate.typeList [class*='btn']:before { content:''; position:absolute; left:50%; top:50%; width:8px; height:13px; margin:-6px 0 0 -4px; background:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/sfix_btn_paginate.png') no-repeat 0 0; background-size:100px auto; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productPaginate.typeList .btnNext:before { background-position:-50px 0; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productPaginate.typeList .page { display:inline-block; height:32px; vertical-align:top; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productPaginate.typeList .page:after { content:''; display:block; clear:both; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productPaginate.typeList .page li { display:inline-block; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productPaginate.typeList .page li a { display:block; margin:0 8px; font-size:15px; line-height:32px; color:#999; text-decoration:none; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productPaginate.typeList .page .other { }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .productPaginate.typeList .page .this { font-weight:bold; color:#000; }
/* 할인 기간 */
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .discountPeriod { display:inline-block; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .layerDiscountPeriod { display:none; border:1px solid #565960; background:#fff; -webkit-box-shadow:3px 3px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); -moz-box-shadow:3px 3px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);box-shadow:3px 3px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .layerDiscountPeriod strong.title { display:block; margin:0 0 12px; padding:0 35px 0 0; font-weight:bold; color:#2e2e2e; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .layerDiscountPeriod strong.title img { vertical-align:middle; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .layerDiscountPeriod .content p { margin:2px 0 0; font-size:11px; line-height:16px; color:#757575; letter-spacing:-1px; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .layerDiscountPeriod .content p strong { font-weight:normal; font-size:12px; color:#2e2e2e; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .layerDiscountPeriod .content p strong span { font-size:11px; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .layerDiscountPeriod .edge { display:none; }
/* 구매조건에 따라 배송비 차등부과 layer */
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .shippingFee .ec-base-tooltip .btnTooltip { position: static; }
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .shippingFee .ec-base-tooltip .btnTooltip .differentialShipping .close a {text-indent: 150%;}
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .shippingFee .ec-base-tooltip .btnTooltip .differentialShipping { left:0; right:0; width: 88%;margin:3px auto 0; }
/* shopQ start*/
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a #ec-product-searchdata-form { display:block !important; }
/* 상세검색 레이어 팝업(팝업형) */
.dnd_module_f6536a6b67d265557d0b504087aeee6a .xans-product-searchdata .searchCondition { display:none; z-index:301; overflow-y:auto; max-width:900px; margin: 0 auto;  position:fixed; top:0; left:0; right:0; bottom:0; background:#fff; -webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch; }

<script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    function pageLoaded() {
        // only skin , no 편집창
    }
 
    function dndComponent() {
        /**
    	 * 카테고리 리스트 상품 정렬
    	 */
        var aUrl = location.href.split('?');
        var sQueryString = aUrl[1];

        $(document).ready(function(){
            if (sQueryString && sQueryString.indexOf('sort_method') > -1) {
                for (var i=0; i<$('#selArray option').length; i++) {
                    if ($('#selArray option:eq('+i+')').val().indexOf(sQueryString) > -1) {
                        $('#selArray option:eq('+i+')').attr("selected", true);
                    }
                }
            }
        });

        $('#selArray').change(function() {
            if ($('#selArray').val()) {
                location.href=$('#selArray').val();
            }
        });

        function goThumg(url) {
            location.href = url+'?'+sQueryString;
        }

        $('#order_by').change(function() {
            if(!sQueryString){
                return;
            }

            if ($(this).find('option:selected').val()) {
                if (sQueryString.indexOf('order_by') == -1) {
                    location.href = location.href+'&order_by='+$(this).find('option:selected').val();
                } else {
                    aParam = sQueryString.split('&');
                    for(var x in aParam) {
                        if (aParam[x].indexOf('order_by') > -1) {
                            aParam[x] = 'order_by='+$(this).find('option:selected').val();
                        }
                    }
                    location.href = aUrl[0] +'?'+aParam.join('&');
                }
            }

        });


        function eSearchKeywordDel() {
            $('#shopQ').find('button.btnDelete').bind('click', function () {
                $(this).parent().find('input.keyword').attr('value', '').focus();
            });
        }

        $(document).ready(function(){
            eSearchKeywordDel();
        });
    }
 
    if (document.readyState == 'complete') {
        dndComponent();
    } else {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', dndComponent);
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', pageLoaded);
    }
})();
</script>
</div><div class="ec-dnd-iframe-cover"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    function pageLoaded() {
        // only skin , no 편집창
    }
 
    function dndComponent() {
        /**
    	 * 카테고리 리스트 상품 정렬
    	 */
        var aUrl = location.href.split('?');
        var sQueryString = aUrl[1];

        $(document).ready(function(){
            if (sQueryString && sQueryString.indexOf('sort_method') > -1) {
                for (var i=0; i<$('#selArray option').length; i++) {
                    if ($('#selArray option:eq('+i+')').val().indexOf(sQueryString) > -1) {
                        $('#selArray option:eq('+i+')').attr("selected", true);
                    }
                }
            }
        });

        $('#selArray').change(function() {
            if ($('#selArray').val()) {
                location.href=$('#selArray').val();
            }
        });

        function goThumg(url) {
            location.href = url+'?'+sQueryString;
        }

        $('#order_by').change(function() {
            if(!sQueryString){
                return;
            }

            if ($(this).find('option:selected').val()) {
                if (sQueryString.indexOf('order_by') == -1) {
                    location.href = location.href+'&order_by='+$(this).find('option:selected').val();
                } else {
                    aParam = sQueryString.split('&');
                    for(var x in aParam) {
                        if (aParam[x].indexOf('order_by') > -1) {
                            aParam[x] = 'order_by='+$(this).find('option:selected').val();
                        }
                    }
                    location.href = aUrl[0] +'?'+aParam.join('&');
                }
            }

        });


        function eSearchKeywordDel() {
            $('#shopQ').find('button.btnDelete').bind('click', function () {
                $(this).parent().find('input.keyword').attr('value', '').focus();
            });
        }

        $(document).ready(function(){
            eSearchKeywordDel();
        });
    }
 
    if (document.readyState == 'complete') {
        dndComponent();
    } else {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', dndComponent);
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', pageLoaded);
    }
})();
</script>
</div>
